text:
Bruce A. Seals (June 18, 1953 – December 15, 2020) was an American basketball player. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. His career lasted from 1973 to 1984. Seals played for the Utah Stars, Seattle SuperSonics, Pallacanestro Varese and for Reyer Venezia.
Seals died on December 15, 2020 in Boston, Massachusetts at the age of 67.
